    • Method Detail

      • checkTags

        SearchTag checkTags(String value)
        Matches and processed a tag, if one is found in the value passed in.
        Parameters:
        value - raw query string entered by user
        Returns:
        instance of SearchTag providing the type of match and the true search value with the tag removed if a tag was found, otherwise return null.
